title: Let's Talk About Dr Disrespect - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.02.19
description:
See why Upstart is ranked #1 in their category with over 300 businesses on Trustpilot and hurry to http://Upstart.com/KFGAMES to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

Boost is only available at http://Experian.com/kfgames

Andrea and Greg dive into Doc's apology and his Twitter battle this morning.

Time Stamps - 
00:01:45 - Housekeeping
RTX is THIS WEEK and all of Kinda Funny will be there. Come to our signing Friday! Come see our panels Saturday: Kinda Funny: We Need Your Sub More Than Funhaus @ 2 p.m. Michael Jones and Greg Miller: Let’s See What Happens @5:30 p.m.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Colton Yoder, Black Jack, Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:02:35 - Guy Beahm on Dr Disrespect’s Twitch Ban
00:29:42 - PlayStation Plus Hot Swap
00:34:22 - CD Projekt Red on three different Cyberpunk games, Matt Kim @ IGN
00:36:23 - Ghostbusters: The Video Game Remastered
00:38:22 - Shenmue 3 Steam Refunds, Matthew Handrahan @ GIB
00:38:45 Best Friend Q. - The weird thing about this is that it's a Kickstarted game that got money from crowd funding and basically changing the promise of it landing on this platform. - Keylocke
00:42:35 - Out today
00:45:30 -  UPSTART
00:46:44 - EXPERIAN
Reader mail   -
00:48:20 - What will the PSVR2 look like - Arvel
00:56:00 -  - Richard
00:56:35 - Squad Up:Oliver from England(PS4) - probablyoliver
00:57:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Whitta
